comment.author: 98299020@N00
comment._content: I'd love to see you do a collaboration with the Smithsonian, www.flickr.com/photos/smithsonian/ and publish in their magazine. Or has that been done?

comment.author: 47567986@N00
comment._content: Speaking purely for NYPL's side of things, we're increasingly looking toward collaborations with other institutions, partly to expose our collections to larger audiences and partly because our materials are even more useful when they're pooled with like materials in other museums/libraries/archives. There's nothing explicitly on the agenda w/r/t the Smithsonian in particular, but they're a natural partner, and we'll definitely explore ideas.

comment._content: This photograph captures a bit of her spirit,  it seems,  as if her eyes have seen so much for such a young woman.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called All things "Rusyn", and we'd love to have this added to the group!
